Key Match Events: Anunoby's key dunks during a 13-2 fourth-quarter run
Knicks' 31 assists and 49% shooting from the floor
Post-Match Reflections: Knicks' balanced scoring and ball movement were key to their victory
Embiid's struggles in his season debut were noted
Miscellaneous Highlights: Knicks' win marked their first of the season
Embiid's rustiness after the Paris Olympics was a factor
Others: Game was the opener of NBA Cup group play for both teams
